problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,点E在AB上,AE:EB=1:2,AC,DE交于点F,△AEF的面积为6cm²,则△CDF的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, point E is on AB, AE:EB = N_0:N_1, AC, DE intersect at point F, the area of ​​△AEF is N_2 ^ 2, then the area of ​​△CDF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AE:EB=1:2,∴AE:AB=1:(1+2)=1:3,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,AB=CD,∴AE:CD=AE:AB=1:3,△AEF∽△CDF,∴\frac{\bigtriangleupAEF的面积}{\bigtriangleupCDF的面积}=(\frac{AE}{CD})²,即\frac{6}{\bigtriangleupCDF的面积}=(\frac{1}{3})²,解得△CDF的面积=6×9=54cm²．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的判定与性质,平行四边形的性质,主要利用了相似三角形面积的比等于相似比的平方的性质．
